subject: Bicycle Motocross
United States Armament and Defense
Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The BMX racer Arielle Martin and her husband left Utah — she for California and he for Afghanistan — on the same day to pursue different dreams.
snippet: The BMX racer Arielle Martin and her husband left Utah — she for California and he for Afghanistan — on the same day to pursue different dreams.
